WorkItem.Description: You currently cannot parse source files with an idiographic space in it. Probably the parser needs complete support for Unicode "space separators". See attached file as an example.
WorkItem.Summary: Support ideographic space (\u3000) and other unicode space separators

Comments.Message: Thanks Brian, this is fixed with: http://typescript.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/6a671ee2e131
